=== Requirements ===

# ''Rationale:'' Language support.
# ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries, just dictionaries.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''

** Good maintenance in Debian.
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
